name: Llama 3.3 70B Instruct
description: Meta's 70B parameter model with enhanced capabilities for coding, reasoning, tool use, and general knowledge tasks

skills.name: Code Generation and Analysis
skills.description: Generate, analyze, and debug code across multiple programming languages
examples: Write a Python script to analyze stock market data
Debug this JavaScript function and fix the errors
Create a machine learning model for image classification

skills.name: Step-by-Step Reasoning
skills.description: Solve complex problems with detailed step-by-step reasoning
examples: Solve this physics problem showing all steps
Analyze this business case and provide recommendations
Walk through the solution to this complex algorithm

skills.name: JSON Function Calling
skills.description: Generate structured JSON outputs for function calling and API integrations
examples: Extract contact information from this email as JSON
Convert this product description into a structured format
Create a JSON schema for this database design

skills.name: Tool Use
skills.description: Identify relevant tools and invoke them appropriately for specific tasks
examples: Search for recent papers on quantum computing
Calculate the compound interest on this investment
Convert this image to a different format

skills.name: Multilingual Communication
skills.description: Generate and understand content in multiple languages
examples: Translate this technical document from English to Hindi
Write a marketing slogan in Thai
Summarize this German article in English
